edited_stories.edited_story_text: We went to the airport to pick up our girl friends. We had a lot of fun welcoming them! All of us were there to celebrate their arrival. All of us girls were having a great time greeting each other! There weren't enough hugs to go around, everyone was so happy to see one another!
